abstract: In the current climate for energy deals the best strategy may not be to wait for an auction process to start, but rather, to bid first and bid high, Reuters reported.
snippet: In the current climate for energy deals the best strategy may not be to wait for an auction process to start, but rather, to bid first and bid high, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: In the current climate for energy deals, the best strategy may not be to wait for an auction process to start, but rather to bid first and bid high, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Trend for High, Pre-emptive Bids in Energy Deals
